definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: Chapter Two researches on the exertion of subrogation right of marine insurance.
sentences.chinese: 第二章探讨海上保险代位求偿权的行使。

sentences.english: Exertion of the right of rescission is necessary to rescind a contract.
sentences.chinese: 第三，解除权的行使与消灭。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is necessary to relieve the power to the contract to exercise conducts the discussion research.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有必要对合同解除权的行使进行探讨研究。

sentences.english: Where a director encounters barriers when he normally exercises his power, he shall report it to the CIRC .
sentences.chinese: 董事正常行使职权遇到障碍，应当向中国保监会报告。

sentences.english: Not a car road, but the most hair-raising experience you can have on your own two legs.
sentences.chinese: 没有一条汽车可以行使的道路，一切都凭着你的双脚。

sentences.english: WHO exercises copyright over its website and publications.
sentences.chinese: 世界卫生组织对其网站和出版物行使版权。

sentences.english: Jesus was the man who performed miracles and put forward prophesies.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣是那行使神迹和作出预言的人。

sentences.english: "Servility" is obstruct the exercise of the right to freedom of the root.
sentences.chinese: “奴性性”是妨碍自由权利行使的根源。

sentences.english: I feel this is meddlesome , if be proper exercise powers and authorities of office, what are you afraid of?
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这是好事，如果是正当行使职权，你怕什么？

sentences.english: The second part is about the analysis of the right foundation of the Bankruptcy Recall Right.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是有关破产取回权行使的相关问题的分析。

sentences.english: Enjoy the feeling of power that is rightfully yours as the parent in the family.
sentences.chinese: 享受在家庭教育中正确行使父母权力的愉悦感。

sentences.english: Use a yoga pad or pillow to cushion the knee when exercising.
sentences.chinese: 使用瑜伽垫或枕头垫在膝盖在行使。

sentences.english: A country can only exercise the right of asylum in its own territory.
sentences.chinese: 一个国家只能在自己的领土内行使庇护权。

sentences.english: Will you Strike it Lucky, catch Gold Fever or be left bankrupt?
sentences.chinese: 你会行使其瑞，捞金发热或留待破产吗？

sentences.english: Congress shall make no law respecting an establishment of religion or prohibiting the free exercise thereof.
sentences.chinese: 国会不得通过立法确立宗教或禁止自由行使宗教权利。

sentences.english: However, if one party is a vegetable, how can his conjugal rights be executed?
sentences.chinese: 但一方若是植物人，他的婚姻权又应如何行使呢？

definition: to have the right to/to be entitled to/to have authority/powerful
to fulfill (one's obligations)/to carry out (a task)/to implement (an agreement)/to perform
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
